\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\& M \& \cdot \\
	{M_i } \& {M_k} \\
	\& {M_j } \& \cdot
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}", hook, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}"', hook, from=2-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}", hook, from=2-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\text{pure}}"', hook, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
